title: [NEW] Having issues Patching 5.21? Click Here!
body:
Hey Everyone,

Whoa, such a busy week!  The [World Finals](http://worlds.lolesports.com/en_US/) (RIP NA) is fast approaching, League champions are experiencing [Shadow and Fortune](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/shadow-and-fortune/chapter-1.html), and the [Ranked Season is ending in less than 2 weeks](http://bit.ly/1H8vM18)!  To make sure you have as much time as possible to grind out those last few games, follow the steps here if you experience any issues while patching!

-----------------------------------------

> ***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scanned already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

> ***Launcher/Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!


> ***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body: I'm not sure if this pertains to the patch itself, but it started right after I updated. Every time I try to get in game it crashes. Champion select works fine but once it gets onto the loading screen I don't even see the champion icons before it closes, brings up bug splat and tells me it has crashed. when I attempt to reconnect. it just crashes again. I tried repairing the game files but it didn't fix the problem. Any ideas?

I started to patch today and just when it was about to hit 99%, the patcher just suddenly crashed. So I opened the patcher up again, and it started scanning files. It scanned about 19k files when the patcher crashed again. This never happened before and i don't know what to do. Btw, I'm using a mac.
Since downloading this patch, I've been getting Maestro errors. Any idea how to get rid of them?

Patcher wont finish at all for me, it will patch, and then scan files, get to 99% and then the error will come up "Unspecified Error has occurred"
I have tried all the suggestions on the board above. Cleared all the firewall settings to allow league of legends, even in the advanced section, and also tried the force re-patch and also deleting LoL altogether and reinstalled but nothing. This is annoying because I can't play with my mates whatsoever. I've submitted a ticket but I doubt it will come back any time soon.

So when i start up the patcher it scans the files fine and then starts the download, but within thirty seconds my download speed starts to go from 1500-2000 kbps until it hits zero. max i ever get with the patch is 1-2% and then it just stops

Just to confirm, when it drops down to zero, does it stay there unchanging even after an extended period of time?

If so, this seems like it may be caused by 2 possible root causes:

1)  There is a Permissions issue on your OS.  The patcher is trying to read certain files in your installation and is being blocked, therefore causing your download speed to plummet to zero.  To rule this out, make sure to complete all of the steps found in our [Permissions Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

2)  There is something blocking your connection from getting the necessary files.  In this case, make sure to run through all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)  I know there are quite a few steps there, but make sure that you complete every one as they are vital in possibly resolving this issue.

Let me know if you are still experiencing these same issues!
Stays zero, doesnt come back up. It starts off as 1k kbps and then drops after 30 seconds normally. Once it went to about 20 mb left and went to 0 kbps. I'm updating windows rn, will get back.
UPDATE: GOT IT TO WORK. updated to windows 10 and viola.
Same, someone please help
This has happened in my last 2 patches and I need some clarification
Aaaand I finally got it to pass 33%. No help from Riot, no help from support, no response from Rioters, and no working fix. This company is amazing.
how did you do it i have been trying since thursday morning
its saying it has 0MB left to download but yet its only at 25% why is this
OK. I fixed mine, go into your router and disable all thing related to IPV6. Worked for me. Disable all your routers firewalls. (If possible) port forward league aswell.
sick of this still isnt working and i have done everything you told me to do still gets stuck at 32% riot fix this
*yawn* Another hour of being completely ignored.

After updating the patch completely over night it took over 12 hours to get it to 99%, it got stuck and it shows zero files scanned. I honestly don't want to spend alll day and night redoing the patch but i will attempt it one more time if i can get the answer to fix my problem..

please help my stops at 32% and has (0.00mb) and (555 KBps) but it hasn't moved for hours this started when i was updating to 5.21 i have been playing league for ages so its not like my league has been broken for a while anyway i ended up just removing the game from my pc to re-install the game but i still get the same problem and its really frustrating me always stopping at 32% does anyone have any ideas at what it might be? please help

If the error keeps consistently occurring at 32%, and it continues even after a re-installation, then it seems like there may be an issue with your OS Permissions.  As to why it would all of a sudden kick-in, its hard to say.  However to rule this out as a possible root cause, make sure to finish all of the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions).

If you still can't get past 32%, feel free to reply back and give me a heads up!

We seem to have the exact same problem... i am desperately trying since the update, tried everything. I'm in the fifth re-install still crashes at 33%. Please, if you find a solution be kind enough to share it.
OK. I fixed mine, go into your router and disable all thing related to IPV6. Worked for me. Disable all your routers firewalls. (If possible) port forward league aswell.
its your network, not permissions. I brought my Computer to my buds house to patch and it did. So its definitly something to due with network/router/modem
its your network, not permissions

My launcher freezes at 32% at 0 Mb left to download and 0 mb/s dl speed. I have left it here for 2 hours and it crashed giving me the "unspecefied reasons". I havce done all the fixes (firewall, files, IPV4, DNS... you name it) you have already recommended in the comments. I have done several forced restarts etc... I have been at it for 5 hours now and its frustrasting me to hell. When I repair the files through the launcher it just crashes the launcher aswell. I dont know what to do, please help.
heres a picture of the launcher http://imgur.com/gallery/o3WiuE8/new

ok im pretty mad. I downloaded the patch. then of course I fiddle with runes and masteries and I jump into que. I wait and find a group and make it to loading in and the game crashed. APPARENTLY something from the patch did not come. I had to redownload andit made me afk for 17 minutes of my game. honestly I don't want to jump in another game cause I would rather not get a leaver buster if this happens again.

I'm having an error that while patching that says "unspecified error please consult logs" or something to that effect.  The problem is, I don't know how to get to the logs to see what the problem is to get it fixed.  I tried looking up solutions online, however none of those were helpful.
The silence speaks volumes. I don't think they even know what they broke.

Please help,  when I launch LOL  starts downloading the patch but after scanning around 10k+ files the patch idles at 33% then it jumps to 99% and it tells me that and unspecified error happens and tells me to check the logs. I have read other posts on the same problem and tried those solutions. Have downloaded the latest windows update, switch to a wired connection, tried to force a re-patch, tried to repair the game, uninstalled it and installed the game again, run the game as an administrator, made sure the game wasn't being blocked by the firewall or my antivirus program but nothing works. Please help me see that all important orange play square.

All hail the orange square!...or is it a rectangle?

Anyways, if you are getting this error at 99%, this honestly does sound like a connection issue.  Given that you seem to have tried almost all of the steps in our Connection Issues Guide, there are two steps you can take further:

A)  Try a[ full an complete re-installation](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) of League.  I know that is a tedious and time-consuming task, but it would allow us to rule out some possible root causes with the patcher itself.

B)  If you are still experiencing the same issue, even after the re-install, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our Tech Specialists can work with you one-on-one in order to get this issue resolved.  If you do submit a ticket, make sure to include the following:

1) [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

2) [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
I just got a notice for PBE today and I think this isn't the right place to post it but since its about patching what do i do if  they aren't letting me go into the 3rd step

what's going on with me is that, when it comes up, it just goes straight to "Applying patches". never moves from that. i tried downloading it overnight but when i got back to it, it had gotten to 45%, but when i clicked anything it would close. ive tried running as admin but it made no difference. ive tried resetting winsock but it wont let me because im not running it as admin. i doubt sure if changing my resolution would help, and im definitely not disabling my firewall for a video game. any ideas to fix this?
I would also like to point out that this has been going on for quite a few days and I'd REALLY like some help before 5.25 {{item:3070}}

I started patching LoL when my computer suddenly shut down, after I started it up again the patch was at 33% and it said it was applying patches. I left my computer to patch over the night and nothing changed.. This has never happened to me before and I am pretty sure I'll have to download it again..

Please help me! I just started updating patch 5.24 and now my client is getting stuck at 33%, this has never happened to me before and I cant send a support request because its not letting me submit it. I put all the information into the form, but its just not submitting. I also inserted my logs into the form.

I have another problem. i'm using a macbook pro and then when i open league of legends the lolauncher icon appear and when he dissapears and i don't have the window when i'm supposing to click on the launch button what i need to do to fix it?? 
Please help me.

I opened up the launcher today and logged in as per usual. Instead of being greeted by the regular client, it's the client from season 3...?

I don't know what I should do in this situation and would like assistance.
i think you just need to do the "repair" thing even if you dowloaded the patch

ok so this is my issue. ever since i downloaded the patch i have been experiencing latency issues, ping always perfectly fine and never had problems before. ping is always between 50 and 60, but MS goes up to 80, and sometimes jumps up to 120 or even 200! literally, too annoying to deal with cant properly play and it really sucks. anyone else have this happen and or know how to fix?

Well its been around a week since patch 5.21 and i still cant update due to "Unspecified Error has Occurred" message. The progress bar starts at 33% instead of 0% and also surprisingly reaches 99%(0 files scanning) even with the message up/after clicking continue which i find strange. Wondering if others also have the same problem. I've done everything i could as suggested in the Patching/Connection Issues articles too.  So yea..... I just want to play since i feel like I'm missing out on quite a lot.
Help please i want to play before season ends..

what happen riot !!!

every patch should fix things not destroying things> since 5.21 patch i cant log in with my account 
by the way 
i dont have any connction porblems
When you try to log into your account, are you getting any specific error message that could help us figure out what might be happening?

Have you tried any of the troubelshooting in the article that was linked from the client?

Normally, I would suggest starting with checking for Windows Updates. However, assuming you are on the most current Service Pack for XP (SP3), it is unlikely that you have any pending updates as Microsoft hasn't supported XP for quite some time now.

The first thing I would recommend trying would be trying to clear your DNS settings to see if flushing the cache helps at all.

> 1. Close all open web browsers and applications.
> 1. Open the Start Menu.
> 1. Click "All Programs."
> 1. Click "Accessories."
> 1. Right click on "Command Prompt" select Run as Administrator.
> 1. In the command prompt type "ipconfig /flushdns" without the quotes and press Enter.
> 1. Restart your computer.
> 1. Try logging in again.

If that doesn't work, we can attempt to change the DNS server from the default one your ISP gives you to a public one that we know works with League of Legends.

>1. Open the Start Menu.
>1. Open Control Panel.
>1. Open Network Connections.
>1. Right click on your network adapter and select “Properties”
>1. Select “Internet Protocol (TCP/IP)” and open “Properties”
>1. Go to the bottom of the menu and change "Obtain DNS server address automatically," to "Use the following DNS server addresses:"
Put in the following public DNS servers, one in each empty field:
>  * 8.8.8.8 
>  * 8.8.4.4
> 1. Save your changes by selecting “Ok.”
> 1. Close all open web browsers and applications.
> 1. Open the Start Menu.
> 1. Click "All Programs."
> 1. Click "Accessories."
> 1. Right click on "Command Prompt" select Run as Administrator.
> 1. In the command prompt type "ipconfig /flushdns" without the quotes and press Enter.
> 1. Restart your computer.
> 1. Try logging in again.

If those options don't fix the problem, you can look [through this article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944) and see if anything else helps. Or let us know so we can continue to assist you. Hopefully the problem gets resolved soon.
None of these works

Are you having the same problem as ROCK BONES or a different problem? He was getting a connection error when he tries to log in. If you are having as simular problem did you look through the solutions I also provided in the following link? https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944
I have tried the following solutions already and I still get the logging in error of  "Did not receive a response from server; retrying. (Attempt 1) 2..3.. "
I am having problems logging into the game ever since yesterday night as it shows Login Status: Did not receive a response from server; retrying. (Attempt 1) 2..3..  everytime i try to get in
